{{VO/Story

<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title          = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle       = Hello
|vo_01_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx             = こんにちは、私はズバイルシアター所属のニィロウ。今日の演目はダンスだよ。見逃さないでね、さあ始まるよ！
|vo_01_01_rm             = Konnichiwa, watashi wa Zubairu Shiataa shozoku no Niirou. Kyou no enmoku wa dansu da yo. Minogasanaide ne, saa hajimaru yo!
|vo_01_01_tl             = Hello, I'm Nilou from Zubayr Theater. Today's program features one dance. Don't miss it &mdash; it's starting now!

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title          = 世間話・練習
|vo_02_01_subtitle       = Chat: Practice
|vo_02_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Practice.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx             = まずはこうして…次の動きは…こうかな、うんうん。
|vo_02_01_rm             = Mazu wa kou shite... tsugi no ugoki wa... kou ka na, un un.
|vo_02_01_tl             = First it goes like this... then the next movement goes... like this, mm-hmm.

|vo_02_02_title          = 世間話・眠気
|vo_02_02_subtitle       = Chat: Sleepiness
|vo_02_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Sleepiness.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx             = 深呼吸をして、大きな風船を膨らませながら、そこに眠気を閉じ込めるの、ふぅ{{lmdash}}風船よ、飛んでけー！
|vo_02_02_rm             = Shinkokyuu wo shite, ookina fuusen wo fukuramasenagara, soko ni nemuke wo tojikomeru no, fuu{{lmdash}} Fuusen yo, tondekee!
|vo_02_02_tl             = Take a deep breath as you blow up a big balloon, then seal your sleepiness inside, poof&mdash; Fly away, balloon!

|vo_02_03_title          = 世間話・休み
|vo_02_03_subtitle       = Chat: Rest
|vo_02_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Rest.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx             = こういう穏やかな日も悪くないよね…のんびりしよ～っと。
|vo_02_03_rm             = Kou iu odayaka na hi mo warukunai yo ne... Nonbiri shiyo~tto.
|vo_02_03_tl             = Peaceful days like this aren't so bad... Let's take it easy.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title          = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle       = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx             = 空も気持ちと同じで、時には暗くなってしまうの。でも、焦る必要はないよ、雨上がりの空はより澄み渡るものだから。
|vo_03_01_rm             = Sora mo kimochi to onaji de, toki ni wa kuraku natte shimau no. Demo, aseru hitsuyou wa nai yo, ame-agari no sora wa yori sumiwataru mono da kara.
|vo_03_01_tl             = The skies are a lot like our feelings, and sometimes they'll get quite dark. But there's no need to worry, because the skies after rain are even clearer.

|vo_03_02_title          = 雷の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle       = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx             = 雷の音ってちょっと怖いよね、あなたはどう？そうだ、怖くなくなる不思議な方法を教えてあげるね。
|vo_03_02_rm             = Kaminari no oto tte chotto kowai yo ne, anata wa dou? Sou da, kowakunaku naru fushigi na houhou wo oshiete ageru ne.
|vo_03_02_tl             = The sound of thunder is a little scary, isn't it? How are you feeling? Oh, right, I can teach you a funny little trick so you won't be scared.

|vo_03_03_title          = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle       = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx             = えっ？わわっ{{lmdash}}雪だ。ほら聞こえる？ちらちらと雪の降る音がするよ。それに舞い散る雪の華は、まるで自然の精霊が踊ってるみたいだよね？
|vo_03_03_rm             = E'? Wawa{{lmdash}} Yuki da. Hora kikoeru? Chirachira to yuki no furu oto ga suru yo. Sore ni maichiru yuki no hana wa, maru de shizen no seirei ga odotteru mitai da yo ne?
|vo_03_03_tl             = Huh? Whoa&mdash; It's snow! Hey, can you hear it? It's the sound of the snow fluttering down. And the dancing snowflakes make it look just like the spirits of nature are dancing, don't they?

|vo_03_04_title          = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle       = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx             = いい天気だね…日向ぼっこでぽかぽか、んん～、眠くなってきちゃった…
|vo_03_04_rm             = Ii tenki da ne... Hinata-bokko de pokapoka, nn~, nemuku natte kichatta...
|vo_03_04_tl             = This weather is lovely... It's so nice and warm in the sun, mmm... Now I'm sleepy...

|vo_03_05_title          = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_05_subtitle       = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx             = 大丈夫？砂ぼこりに気をつけてね。
|vo_03_05_rm             = Daijoubu? Sunabokori ni ki wo tsukete ne.
|vo_03_05_tl             = Are you all right? Watch out for clouds of dust.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title          = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle       = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx             = おはよう。ん？じっとこっちを見て、どうしたの…もしかして髪の毛がハネてる？～～～～っ！み、見ないで。す、すぐ直すから。
|vo_04_01_rm             = Ohayou. N? Jitto kocchi wo mite, doushita no... Moshi ka shite kami no ke ga haneteru? {{Not a typo|~~|~~}}'! Mi, minaide. Su, sugu naosu kara.
|vo_04_01_tl             = Good morning. Hmm? Why are you staring at me...? Is my hair sticking up? Ahh! D-Don't look. I-I'm gonna fix it!

|vo_04_02_title          = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle       = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx             = う～ん、昼食はナンにしようかな、でもお米もいいよね。それともマッシュ豆にしよっかな？
|vo_04_02_rm             = U~n, chuushoku wa nan ni shiyou ka na, demo okome mo ii yo ne. Soretomo masshu-mame ni shiyo kka na?
|vo_04_02_tl             = Hmm, maybe I'll have naan for lunch, but rice would be nice too. Or maybe I'll go with hummus?

|vo_04_03_title          = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle       = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_04_03_tx             = こんばんは。今夜、ズバイルシアターで踊るんだ。もし良かったら、二人分のチケットをあげよっか？
|vo_04_03_rm             = Konbanwa. Kon'ya, Zubairu Shiataa de odoru nda. Moshi yokattara, futari-bun no chiketto wo ageyo kka?
|vo_04_03_tl             = Good evening. I'm dancing at Zubayr Theater tonight. If you'd like, how about I give you two tickets?

|vo_04_04_title          = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle       = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx             = 寝る前に悩みをすべて打ち明けると、ぐっすり眠れるよ。もしあなたが望むなら、喜んで私が聞き手になるから言ってね。
|vo_04_04_rm             = Neru mae ni nayami wo subete uchiakeru to, gussuri nemureru yo. Moshi anata ga nozomu nara, yorokonde watashi ga kikite ni naru kara itte ne.
|vo_04_04_tl             = If you open up about all your worries before you go to bed, you can sleep better. If you want, I'd be happy to listen to you talk, so just let me know.

<!-- About -->
|vo_05_01_title          = {name}自身について・ボディーランゲージ
|vo_05_01_subtitle       = About {character}: Body Language
|vo_05_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Body Language.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx             = 言葉より、ダンスのほうが上手く気持ちを伝えられる時もある。だから、何を言えばいいか迷った時は、踊ってみるといいよ。
|vo_05_01_rm             = Kotoba yori, dansu no hou ga umaku kimochi wo tsutaerareru toki mo aru. Dakara, nani wo ieba ii ka mayotta toki wa, odotte miru to ii yo.
|vo_05_01_tl             = Sometimes, dance is better at conveying your feelings than words. So when you just don't know what to say, try dancing.

|vo_05_02_title          = {name}自身について・踊りと知識
|vo_05_02_subtitle       = About {character}: Dance and Wisdom
|vo_05_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Dance and Wisdom.ogg
|vo_05_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_05_02_tx             = 知識を追い求めるには優れた才能が必要で、一生懸命頑張った末に、疲れ切って心が折れてしまう人もたくさんいるの…でもダンスは違うよ。たとえそのコツを掴むことができなくても、ダンスは見るだけでその楽しさを味わえる。もしその動きの中から、芸術的な美しさと価値を見出してくれたら、なおのこと嬉しいな。
|vo_05_02_rm             = Chishiki wo oimotomeru ni wa sugureta sainou ga hitsuyou de, isshoukenmei ganbatta sue ni, tsukarekitte kokoro ga orete shimau hito mo takusan iru no... Demo dansu wa chigau yo. Tatoe sono kotsu wo tsukamu koto ga dekinakute mo, dansu wa miru dake de sono tanoshisa wo ajiwaeru. Moshi sono ugoki no naka kara, geijutsuteki na utsukushisa to kachi wo midashite kuretara, nao no koto ureshii na.
|vo_05_02_tl             = You need exceptional talent in order to pursue wisdom, and there are so many people who dedicated their whole lives to it, only to end up exhausted and heartbroken... But dance isn't like that. Even if you don't know how it's done, you can feel happiness just by watching it. And if you can find artistic beauty and value within those movements, I'll be even happier.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title          = 怒りの緩和について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle       = About Us: Dealing with Anger
|vo_06_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Dealing with Anger.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx             = あなたも「怒り」を心の中で抑え込んじゃうことってあるのかな？それはよくないよ。ほら、私の真似をしてみて。まず右手で体の前に大きく円を描く。そして、両手で嫌なことを胸元からすべて取り出して、円の中に入れるの。それを力強く押し出してみて{{lmdash}}どう？スッキリした？
|vo_06_01_rm             = Anata mo "ikari" wo kokoro no naka de osaekonjau koto tte aru no ka na? Sore wa yokunai yo. Hora, watashi no mane wo shite mite. Mazu migite de karada no mae ni ookiku en wo egaku. Soshite, ryoute de iya na koto wo munamoto kara subete toridashite, en no naka ni ireru no. Sore wo chikaradzuyoku oshidashite mite{{lmdash}} Dou? Sukkiri shita?
|vo_06_01_tl             = Are you keeping your anger bottled up inside? That's no good. Here, do as I do. First, take your right hand and draw a big circle in front of your body. Then, use both hands to take all those bad feelings off your chest and put them in the circle. Now try to push it away as hard as you can&mdash; How's that? Do you feel better now?

|vo_06_02_title          = 冒険について…
|vo_06_02_subtitle       = About Us: Going on Adventures
|vo_06_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_06_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Going on Adventures.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx             = 今までスメールシティから出たことはないけど…あなたと一緒に冒険したいの。たとえ見知らぬ土地でも、私は慣れてみせるよ。ええと…稲妻の砂浜って、下からすっごく大きなサンドワームが突然出てきたりしないよね？
|vo_06_02_rm             = Ima made Sumeeru Shiti kara deta koto wa nai kedo... anata to issho ni bouken shitai no. Tatoe mishiranu tochi de mo, watashi wa narete miseru yo. Eeto... Inazuma no sunahama tte, shita kara suggoku ookina sandowaamu ga totsuzen dete kitari shinai yo ne?
|vo_06_02_tl             = I've never left Sumeru City before, but... I'd like to go on adventures with you. Even if it's an unknown land, I'll definitely adjust. Um... [[Inazuma]]'s beaches don't have any gigantic sandworms that will suddenly pop out from below or anything, right?

<!-- Miscellany I -->
|vo_07_01_title          = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle       = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_07_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx             = 私が神の目を授かったのは、初めて舞台で踊った時のことなの。神様が私の観客になってくれたってことは、きっと人間の芸術の美しさを認めてくれたってことだよね。
|vo_07_01_rm             = Watashi ga Kami no Me wo sazukatta no wa, hajimete butai de odotta toki no koto na no. Kami-sama ga watashi no kankyaku ni natte kureta tte koto wa, kitto ningen no geijutsu no utsukushisa wo mitomete kureta tte koto da yo ne.
|vo_07_01_tl             = When I received my Vision, it was my very first time dancing on stage. If the goddess was in my audience, that must mean she acknowledged the beauty of human art.

|vo_07_02_title          = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle       = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx             = 努力が実らないのは、決して珍しいことじゃない。例えば、私がどれだけ頑張っても、明論派の知識を理解できないのと同じようにね。そういう時は頭を振って、脳を回転させるといいよ。そうすれば、考え方も切り替わるはずだから。
|vo_07_02_rm             = Doryoku ga minoranai no wa, kesshite mezurashii koto ja nai. Tatoeba, watashi ga dore dake ganbatte mo, Meironha no chishiki wo rikai dekinai no to onaji you ni ne. Sou iu toki wa atama wo futte, nou wo kaiten saseru to ii yo. Sou sureba, kangaekata mo kirikawaru hazu da kara.
|vo_07_02_tl             = It's hardly unusual for hard work to produce no results. For example, no matter how hard I try, I can never make sense of Rtawahist's knowledge. At times like that, you should give your head a good shake and get your brain moving. If you do that, your way of thinking should turn itself around too.

|vo_07_03_title          = 興味のあること・晶蝶の舞
|vo_07_03_subtitle       = Interesting Things: Dance of the Crystalflies
|vo_07_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Dance of the Crystalflies.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx             = 晶蝶って色とりどりで、とってもきれいだよね。好奇心に駆られてそっと手を伸ばすと、蝶は優雅にひらりと舞って、遠く離れていくの。もし私が空を飛べたら、晶蝶の舞を覚えてたはずだよ。
|vo_07_03_rm             = Shouchou tte irotoridori de, tottemo kirei da yo ne. Koukishin ni kararete sotto te wo nobasu to, chou wa yuuga ni hirari to matte, tooku hanarete iku no. Moshi watashi ga sora wo tobetara, Shouchou no mai wo oboeteta hazu da yo.
|vo_07_03_tl             = Crystalflies come in all sorts of colors, and they're really pretty. When you get curious and reach out your hand to them, they flutter elegantly into dance, and fly off into the distance. If I could fly, I'd learn the dance of the Crystalflies.

|vo_07_04_title          = 興味のあること・パティサラ
|vo_07_04_subtitle       = Interesting Things: Padisarahs
|vo_07_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Padisarahs.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx             = 花神様が踊ると、彼女が踏んだ芝生の上に本物のパティサラが咲くんだって。聞いただけで、うっとりするような光景だよね。一度見てみたいなぁ。
|vo_07_04_rm             = Kashin-sama ga odoru to, kanojo ga funda shibafu no ue ni honmono no Patisara ga saku nda tte. Kiita dake de, uttori suru you na koukei da yo ne. Ichido mite mitai naa.
|vo_07_04_tl             = It's said that when the [[Goddess of Flowers]] danced, real [[Padisarah]]s would bloom in the grass beneath her steps. It sounds like such a breathtaking view. I'd love a chance to see it.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title          = セノについて…
|vo_08_01_subtitle       = About [[Cyno]]
|vo_08_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx             = 教令院の人とは、あまり関わり合いたくないの。だって、彼らは歌や舞といった芸術にいい印象を持っていないから。どうやって退屈をしのいでるんだろうっていつも思うんだ。えっ…セノの場合は、「七聖召喚」をやってるの？なんだか変な感じがするね…
|vo_08_01_rm             = Kyourei-in no hito to wa, amari kakawariaitakunai no. Datte, karera wa uta ya mai to itta geijutsu ni ii inshou wo motteinai kara. Dou yatte taikutsu wo shinoideru ndarou tte itsumo omou nda. E'... Seno no baai wa, "Shichisei Shoukan" wo yatteru no? Nandaka hen na kanji ga suru ne...
|vo_08_01_tl             = I try not to get too involved with people from the Akademiya. After all, they don't have a good impression of the arts, like song or dance. I always wonder how they deal with boredom. Huh, Cyno plays [[Genius Invokation TCG]]? That feels weird somehow...

|vo_08_02_title          = ティナリについて…
|vo_08_02_subtitle       = About [[Tighnari]]
|vo_08_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Tighnari.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx             = 彼はすごい植物学者なんだって。なら、キノコを見分けるのもきっと得意だよね。少なくとも、毒キノコを食べてしまうなんてことはないはず…羨ましいな…
|vo_08_02_rm             = Kare wa sugoi shokubutsu-gakusha nan da tte. Nara, kinoko wo miwakeru no mo kitto tokui da yo ne. Sukunaku to mo, doku-kinoko wo tabete shimau nante koto wa nai hazu... Urayamashii na...
|vo_08_02_tl             = I hear he's an amazing botanist. That means he must be really good at telling apart mushrooms. At the very least, he'll probably never end up eating a poisonous mushroom... I'm so jealous...

|vo_08_03_title          = コレイについて…
|vo_08_03_subtitle       = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx             = 彼女はたまに私の舞台を見に来てくれるんだ。とても熱心な見習いレンジャーだよ。それから、迷子にならないように注意してくれたこともあったな。でも、どうしてだろう？道に迷ったことなんてないのに…
|vo_08_03_rm             = Kanojo wa tama ni watashi no butai wo mi ni kite kureru nda. Totemo nesshin na Minarai Renjaa da yo. Sorekara, maigo ni naranai you ni chuui shite kureta koto mo atta na. Demo, doushite darou? Michi ni mayotta koto nante nai no ni...
|vo_08_03_tl             = She sometimes comes by to see me on stage. She's a very enthusiastic Trainee Forest Ranger. And then there was one time she warned me about getting lost. But why? I've never even gotten lost before...

|vo_08_04_title          = カーヴェについて…
|vo_08_04_subtitle       = About [[Kaveh]]
|vo_08_04_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx             = あの華やかなアルカサルザライパレスを建てたのは、彼だって聞いたよ。あんな作品を生み出せるなんて、作業中はきっと楽しくて夢中だったんだろうね。きっとみんなに披露したいという思いが、喜びやモチベーションに繋がってたんだと思うよ、まるで私がダンスを練習する時と同じみたいにね。
|vo_08_04_rm             = Ano hanayaka na Arukasaruzarai Paresu wo tateta no wa, kare da tte kiita yo. Anna sakuhin wo umidaseru nante, sagyouchuu wa kitto tanoshikute muchuu datta ndarou ne. Kitto minna ni hirou shitai to iu omoi ga, yorokobi ya mochibeeshon ni tsunagatteta nda to omou yo, maru de watashi ga dansu wo renshuu suru toki to onaji mitai ni ne.
|vo_08_04_tl             = I heard he was the one who built the gorgeous [[Palace of Alcazarzaray]]. If he created a piece like that, he must have had lots of fun and been totally absorbed in his work. I'm sure that whenever he thought about showing it to everyone, it would bring him happiness and motivation &mdash; just like when I'm practicing my dance.

|vo_08_05_title          = ディシアについて…
|vo_08_05_subtitle       = About [[Dehya]]
|vo_08_05_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dehya.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx             = 最近は色々なことがあって、なんだか不思議な感じがするの…ディシアとドニアザードにプレゼントを贈りたいんだけど…何がいいか自分一人じゃ決められなくって。グランドバザールのみんながおすすめしてくれたものを全部贈ったら、さすがに多いよね。どうしたらいいんだろう…
|vo_08_05_rm             = Saikin wa iroiro na koto ga atte, nandaka fushigi na kanji ga suru no... Dishia to Doniazaado ni purezento wo okuritai nda kedo... Nani ga ii ka jibun hitori ja kimerarenaku tte. Gurando Bazaaru no minna ga osusume shite kureta mono wo zenbu okuttara, sasuga ni ooi yo ne. Dou shitara ii ndarou...
|vo_08_05_tl             = It feels strange to think about how so many things have happened recently... I'd like to give a present to Dehya and Dunyarzad, but... I can't choose one by myself. And if I gave them all the things that everyone at the Grand Bazaar suggested, it would be too much, of course. What should I do...?

|vo_08_06_title          = ドリーについて…
|vo_08_06_subtitle       = About [[Dori]]
|vo_08_06_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_06_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dori.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx             = あの気前のいい大商人のドリーも私のダンスを見てくれたことがあるんだ。でも確か、ズバイルさんと何か話し合った後、来なくなっちゃったんだよね。一体何があったんだろう？…え？彼女は私を連れてテイワットでツアーを行いたかった？それはないと思うよ、ズバイルさんもきっと断ってくれてるだろうし…たぶん…
|vo_08_06_rm             = Ano kimae no ii daishounin no Dorii mo watashi no dansu wo mite kureta koto ga aru nda. Demo tashika, Zubairu-san to nanika hanashiatta ato, konaku nacchatta nda yo ne. Ittai nani ga atta ndarou? ...E? Kanojo wa watashi wo tsurete Teiwatto de tsuaa wo okonaitakatta? Sore wa nai to omou yo, Zubairu-san mo kitto kotowatte kureteru darou shi... Tabun...
|vo_08_06_tl             = The magnanimous merchant Dori has watched me dance before. But I remember that she talked with [[Sheikh Zubayr|Mr. Zubayr]] about something, then never came back. What could possibly have happened? ...Huh? She wanted to take me on a tour across Teyvat? I don't think so, and Mr. Zubayr would definitely refuse for me... Probably...

|vo_08_07_title          = クラクサナリデビについて…
|vo_08_07_subtitle       = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_07_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_07_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx             = グランドバザールのみんなは、クラクサナリデビ様のことが大好きなんだ。あの方から私の「花神の舞」の評価を聞けたらなぁ…あっ！や、やっぱり大丈夫…もし本当に来てくださったら、きっとすごく緊張しちゃうから…
|vo_08_07_rm             = Gurando Bazaaru no minna wa, Kura Kusanari Debi-sama no koto ga daisuki nan da. Ano kata kara watashi no "Kashin no Mai" no hyouka wo kiketara naa... A'! Ya, yappari daijoubu... Moshi hontou ni kite kudasattara, kitto sugoku kinchou shichau kara...
|vo_08_07_tl             = Everyone at the Grand Bazaar really loves Lesser Lord Kusanali. If only I could hear her thoughts on my Dance of Sabzeruz... Oh no! A-Actually, never mind... If she really came to see it, I'd definitely get super nervous...

<!-- More About -->
|vo_09_01_title          = {name}を知る・１
|vo_09_01_subtitle       = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx             = うーん{{lmdash}}あっ！ごめんね、何を食べようか考えてて、少しボーっとしてたみたい…えへへ、何か手伝えることはあるかな？
|vo_09_01_rm             = Uun{{lmdash}} A'! Gomen ne, nani wo tabeyou ka kangaetete, sukoshi bootto shite mitai... Ehehe, nanika tetsudaeru koto wa aru ka na?
|vo_09_01_tl             = Mmm &mdash; Oh! Sorry, I was thinking about what to eat, and I got a little lost in thought... Hee-hee, is there something I can help you with?

|vo_09_02_title          = {name}を知る・２
|vo_09_02_subtitle       = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship     = 3
|vo_09_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx             = 先生からはダンスのコツをたくさん教えてもらったんだ。けど一番大切なのは感情を込めること、それこそが人の心をもっとも動かすものなんだって。何かを表すには、まず何かを感じる必要がある。美しさを伝えるには、美しさそのものにならなければならないの。
|vo_09_02_rm             = Sensei kara wa dansu no kotsu wo takusan oshiete moratta nda. Kedo ichiban taisetsu na no wa kanjou wo komeru koto, sore koso ga hito no kokoro wo mottomo ugokasu mono nan da tte. Nanika wo arawasu ni wa, mazu nanika wo kanjiru hitsuyou ga aru. Utsukushisa wo tsutaeru ni wa, utsukushisa sono mono ni naranakereba naranai no.
|vo_09_02_tl             = My teacher taught me many of the skills of dance. But the most important one is to put your feelings into it, because that's how you move people's hearts the most. If you want to express something, you need to experience it first. So in order to convey beauty, I need to become beauty itself.

|vo_09_03_title          = {name}を知る・３
|vo_09_03_subtitle       = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_09_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx             = 時々、観客から手紙をもらうことがあるんだ、私のダンスで元気をもらったってね。そういう時は、ズバイルシアターのみんなとその喜びを分かち合うの。観客から見たら、舞台上に立っているのは私一人だけだけど、私からしたらそれはみんなで成し遂げたものだからね。
|vo_09_03_rm             = Tokidoki, kankyaku kara tegami wo morau koto ga aru nda, watashi no dansu de genki wo moratta tte ne. Sou iu toki wa, Zubairu Shiataa no minna to sono yorokobi wo wakachiau no. Kankyaku kara mitara, butaijou ni tatteiru no wa watashi hitori dake da kedo, watashi kara shitara sore wa minna de nashitogeta mono da kara ne.
|vo_09_03_tl             = Sometimes, I get letters from audience members saying that my dancing has cheered them up. When that happens, I like to share that happiness with everyone at Zubayr Theater. From the audience's point of view, I'm the only one on stage, but from my point of view, it's something we all accomplished together.

|vo_09_04_title          = {name}を知る・４
|vo_09_04_subtitle       = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship     = 5
|vo_09_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx             = グランドバザールでは、時々ボールを投げたりキャッチしたりするジャグリングのパフォーマンスをやってる人がいるんだ。私も試しに真似してみたんだけど、どういうわけかボールをキャッチできず、全部頭で受け止めることになってね…しかも、それを見ていたズバイルさんたちに笑われちゃったの…私のこと、こういう協調運動が得意な人だと思ってたみたい。えへへ、弱点がバレちゃったよ。
|vo_09_04_rm             = Gurando Bazaaru de wa, tokidoki booru wo nagetari kyacchi shitari suru jaguringu no pafoomansu wo yatteru hito ga iru nda. Watashi mo tameshi ni mane shite mita nda kedo, dou iu wake ka booru wo kyacchi dekizu, zenbu atama de uketomeru koto ni natte ne... Shika mo, sore wo miteita Zubairu-san-tachi ni warawarechatta no... Watashi no koto, kou iu kyouchou undou ga tokui na hito da to omotteta mitai. Ehehe, jakuten ga barechatta yo.
|vo_09_04_tl             = The Grand Bazaar sometimes hosts people who put on juggling performances where they throw and catch balls. I tried copying them, but somehow, I couldn't catch any of the balls, and they all landed on my head... What's more, Mr. Zubayr and the others saw it and laughed at me... I guess they thought I was good at stuff that takes bodily coordination like that. Hee-hee, my weakness has been exposed.

|vo_09_05_title          = {name}を知る・５
|vo_09_05_subtitle       = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship     = 6
|vo_09_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx             = 以前ね、私のことを暖かな陽の下にあるオアシスみたいな、人々に癒しと温もりをもたらす存在だって言ってくれた人がいるの。それはそれで嬉しかったんだけど、私が追い求めていること…私がみんなに見せたいのは、それ以上に価値があるものなの。それに、あなたと長く一緒にいて分かったことがあるんだ{{lmdash}}誰かに気を遣ってもらって、大切にしてもらうのってこんな感じなんだなって。い…今あらためて考えてみると、あなたのほうがあの喩えにピッタシだなって思うの。
|vo_09_05_rm             = Izen ne, watashi no koto wo atataka na hi no moto ni aru oashisu mitai na, hitobito ni iyashi to nukumori wo motarasu sonzai da tte itte kureta hito ga iru no. Sore wa sore de ureshikatta nda kedo, watashi ga oimotometeiru koto... Watashi ga minna ni misetai no wa, sore ijou ni kachi ga aru mono na no. Sore ni, anata to nagaku issho ni ite wakatta koto ga aru nda{{lmdash}} Dareka ni ki wo tsukatte moratte, taisetsu ni shite morau no tte konna kanji nan da na tte. I... ima aratamete kangaete miru to, anata no hou ga ano tatoe ni pittashi da na tte omou no.
|vo_09_05_tl             = Once, there was someone who told me that I was like an oasis under the warm sun, bringing comfort and warmth to other people. That did make me happy, but what I'm looking for is... What I want to show everyone is something more valuable than that. And I've learned something after spending so much time with you &mdash; what it feels like to be cared for and looked after. Now... now that I think about it again, you're much more fit for that comparison.

<!-- Miscellany II -->
|vo_10_01_title          = {name}の趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle       = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx             = 私の人生は踊ること、踊ることは私の人生…どっちのほうが合ってるかな？はぁ、やっぱりこういう論理的なことを考えるのって向いてないみたい。とにかく、これからも踊り続けるつもりだよ。私のパフォーマンスで、この芸術の美しさをより多くの人に見てもらいたいんだ。
|vo_10_01_rm             = Watashi no jinsei wa odoru koto, odoru koto wa watashi no jinsei... Docchi no hou ga atteru ka na? Haa, yappari kou iu rironteki na koto wo kangaeru no tte muiteinai mitai. Tonikaku, kore kara mo odoritsuzukeru tsumori da yo. Watashi no pafoomansu de, kono geijutsu no utsukushisa wo yori ooku no hito ni mite moraitai nda.
|vo_10_01_tl             = "My life is dance," or "dance is my life"... Which one fits better? *sigh* Of course I'm no good at thinking about logical stuff like this. Anyway, I plan to keep on dancing. I want my performances to show the beauty of this art to more people.

|vo_10_02_title          = {name}の悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle       = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx             = どのキノコに毒があって、どのキノコなら大丈夫なのか、いまだに区別がつかないんだ…色鮮やかなキノコも、地味な見た目をしたキノコも、毒があるかもしれないんだって。はぁ、何か掴みかけても、結局は何も分かってないんだよね…
|vo_10_02_rm             = Dono kinoko ni doku ga atte, dono kinoko nara daijoubu na no ka, imada ni kubetsu ga tsukanai nda... Iroazayaka na kinoko mo, jimi na mitame wo shita kinoko mo, doku ga aru ka mo shirenai nda tte. Haa, nanika tsukamikakete mo, kekkyoku wa nani mo wakattenai nda yo ne...
|vo_10_02_tl             = I still can't figure out which mushrooms are poisonous and which ones are okay... It seems that no matter whether a mushroom looks colorful or plain, it might still be poisonous. *sigh* Even if I can get a grasp on one thing, I don't understand anything in the end...

|vo_10_03_title          = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle       = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx             = スイーツを食べると元気が出るんだ。スメール人の大半はスイーツが好きなんだよ！あなたも食べてみない？おすすめを教えてあげるよ！
|vo_10_03_rm             = Suiitsu wo taberu to genki ga deru nda. Sumeeru-jin no taihan wa suiitsu ga suki nan da yo! Anata mo tabete minai? Osusume wo oshiete ageru yo!
|vo_10_03_tl             = Eating sweets will perk you right up. Most people in Sumeru love sweets! Do you wanna try some? I have some recommendations!

|vo_10_04_title          = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle       = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx             = キノコはちょっと苦手なんだ、怖いから…あっ、別に見た目が怖くて逃げたくなるとか、そういうんじゃないよ。実は子供の頃に毒キノコを食べたせいで何日もベッドで横になってたことがあるの…もしスメールのキノコ料理を食べたいなら、まずは毒キノコじゃないかを忘れず確認してね！
|vo_10_04_rm             = Kinoko wa chotto nigate nan da, kowai kara... A', betsu ni mitame ga kowakute nigetaku naru to ka, sou iu nja nai yo. Jitsu wa kodomo no koro ni doku-kinoko wo tabeta sei de nannichi mo beddo de yoko ni natteta koto ga aru no... Moshi Sumeeru no kinoko ryouri wo tabetai nara, mazu wa doku-kinoko ja nai ka wo wasurezu kakunin shite ne!
|vo_10_04_tl             = I don't really like mushrooms, because I'm scared of them... Oh, no, I don't mean that I'll want to run away when I see them or anything. The truth is that when I was little, I once ate a poisonous mushroom and was bedridden for days... If you want to taste Sumeru's mushroom dishes, make sure they aren't poisonous mushrooms first!

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title          = 贈り物を受け取る・1
|vo_11_01_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx             = 美味しいものが舌の上で踊るのって…こんな感じなんだね…不思議！
|vo_11_01_rm             = Oishii mono ga shita no ue de odoru no tte... Konna kanji nan da ne... Fushigi!
|vo_11_01_tl             = So this is what it's like to have something delicious dancing on your tongue... How wonderful!

|vo_11_02_title          = 贈り物を受け取る・2
|vo_11_02_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx             = ありがとう！私がダンスの練習を欠かさず続けているように、きっとこの料理を作れるようになるまで、あなたも努力してきたんだよね。
|vo_11_02_rm             = Arigatou! Watashi ga dansu no renshuu wo kakasazu tsudzuketeiru you ni, kitto kono ryouri wo tsukureru you ni naru made, anata mo doryoku shite kita nda yo ne.
|vo_11_02_tl             = Thank you! You must have worked hard to be able to make this dish, just like how I always keep up my dance practice.

|vo_11_03_title          = 贈り物を受け取る・3
|vo_11_03_subtitle       = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx             = ごめん、最近あんまり食欲がないんだ、気にしないで。
|vo_11_03_rm             = Gomen, saikin anmari shokuyoku ga nai nda, ki ni shinaide.
|vo_11_03_tl             = Sorry, I just haven't had much of an appetite lately. Please don't worry about it.

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title          = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle       = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx             = その…お誕生日おめでとう。最近、新しいダンスを覚えたの、あなたに披露するためにね。え？なんだか緊張しているみたい？ふぅ{{lmdash}}気付かれちゃったみたいだね。えっと…この気持ちと私の技術を組み合わせようとしたら、振り付けがどんどん難しくなっちゃって…とにかく、いつまでも美と幸福があなたにあらんことを。
|vo_12_01_rm             = Sono... Otanjoubi omedetou. Saikin, atarashii dansu wo oboeta no, anata ni hirou suru tame ni ne. E? Nandaka kinchou shiteiru mitai? Fuu{{lmdash}} Kidzukarechatta mitai da ne. Etto... Kono kimochi to watashi no gijutsu wo kumiawaseyou to shitara, furitsuke ga dondon muzukashiku nacchatte... Tonikaku, itsu made mo bi to koufuku ga anata ni aran koto wo.
|vo_12_01_tl             = Umm... Happy birthday. I've learned a new dance recently, and I wanted to show it to you. Hmm? I look a little nervous? *sigh* So you found me out. So... I wanted to combine my feelings with my technique, but the choreography just got harder and harder... Anyway, may beauty and happiness always be with you.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title          = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension      = 1
|vo_13_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx             = あれ？この感じ、何だろう…
|vo_13_01_rm             = Are? Kono kanji, nan darou...
|vo_13_01_tl             = Huh? What is this feeling...?

|vo_13_02_title          = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension      = 2
|vo_13_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx             = 体がほぐれてきたみたい。今まで以上に活躍できる気がするよ。
|vo_13_02_rm             = Karada ga hogurete kita mitai. Ima made ijou ni katsuyaku dekiru ki ga suru yo.
|vo_13_02_tl             = My body feels so relaxed. I feel like I can do more than ever before!

|vo_13_03_title          = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension      = 4
|vo_13_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx             = 大きな風スライムの上に横たわってるみたい！体がとっても軽く感じるよ！
|vo_13_03_rm             = Ookina Kaze Suraimu no ue ni yokotawatteru mitai! Karada ga tottemo karuku kanjiru yo!
|vo_13_03_tl             = I feel like I'm lying down on a huge Anemo Slime! My body feels so light!

|vo_13_04_title          = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle       = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension      = 6
|vo_13_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx             = あなたと一緒にいるのが好きなんだ。自分でもよく分からないけど、まるで胸のところから蝶が舞い上がるような、そんな感じがするの…うん、やっぱりダンスでこの気持ちを表現するね。
|vo_13_04_rm             = Anata to issho ni iru no ga suki nan da. Jibun demo yoku wakaranai kedo, maru de mune no tokoro kara chou ga maiagaru you na, sonna kanji ga suru no... Un, yappari dansu de kono kimochi wo hyougen suru ne.
|vo_13_04_tl             = I like being with you. I'm not sure why, but it feels like there's a butterfly about to fly out of my chest... Yes, I think I'll express this feeling through a dance.
}}
